PyICe.xml_registers.datasheet_indesign.datasheet_registers_xml module

Adobe Indesign (Datasheet) Register Table and Hyperlink Generator

class PyICe.xml_registers.datasheet_indesign.datasheet_registers_xml.csv_converter(csvfilename, **kwargs)

Bases: inDesignOutput

converts csv input file to appropriate XML format for import to InDesign Expects 6 columns to be ordered: SYMBOL_NAME, COMMAND_CODE, ACCESS ex(R/W), BIT_RANGE ex(15:0), DEFAULT, DESCRIPTION
